name: tunnels of the band hall (squishy productions)
name_original: tunnels of the band hall (squishy productions)
description:
This game is based of a HIGHLY EXAGGERATED time my buddy caleb got lost in the band hall after a football game. In this game you will need to find the key to escape the band halls as you're being chased by Mr.Slaves monster pet. good luck beating my game.

-also this is my 2nd game ever made, I spend over a month on it. i hope you enjoy :)

SQUISHY PRODUCTIONS
